pysar.image.writeHDF5¶

pysar.image.writeHDF5(z, filename, x=None, y=None, dataname=None)¶

Write binary data to an HDF5 file

Parameters:

z : ndarray

Data array

filename : str

Name of output file

x : array-like

2-element list: (top-left x value, x spacing) [(0,1)]

y : array-like

2-element list: (top-left y value, y spacing) [(z.shape[0]-1,-1)]

dataname : str

Optional name for dataset to be included in the header [None]

Previous topic

pysar.image.buffermask

Next topic

pysar.image.writeNetCDF
